content: {"name": "Franciscan Community Development Center of Fairview", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- visit them onTuesdays and  Thursday for registration and an appointment is set there after .\n- Strictly serves members of Bergen county. If you're not within the county  they will not be able to provide services to you.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.franciscancdc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "239 Anderson Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "Fairview", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "07022", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.8164469, "longitude": -73.9953532}, "phones": [{"number": "(201) 941-1000", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "15:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Number of household members"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
